title: Resolve Design Clash in 3D Model
description: An automated clash detection report from the 3D model shows a newly designed pipe rack interfering with an existing structural beam.

tasks.description: Open the clash detection report and locate the specific clash between the pipe rack and the beam.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the two interfering components in the 3D model viewer.

tasks.description: Consult the design specifications for both the piping and structural elements to check for constraints.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the structural beam cannot be moved, but the pipe rack has some routing flexibility.

tasks.description: Modify the pipe rack's path in the CAD model to avoid the beam and submit the change for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reroutes the pipe rack, resolves the clash, and submits the updated drawing for approval.
